In England, in the seven days to 17 February, there were 251,073 new confirmed cases (444.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 February, there were 354,239 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 29% (103,166 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 February is 15,918,472 (28,149.3 cases per 100,000 population).
